textPlain: Okay, so this is actually GitHub's mastodon. I'm down. Honestly, i was just thinking of moving to Gitlab because I have a feeling GitHub might start being terrible soon.

Forgejo started implementing it but it's very far from being useful in practice yet. A lot of work needs to be done first[1], might take years, I guess.[1] https://codeberg.org/forgejo-contrib/federation/src/branch/m...

Is there any server actually using this so one can see it in action? They only seem to list Vervis, but the linked https://vervis.peers.community/ is down. Last obvious activity on the spec/issue tracker is a month ago (fairly recent), blog six months ago, forum a year ago.
im gonna bet this was gpt-5 as patio11 mentioned 1 line suggestion> It’s a little rich, pardon the pun, to cash a check for $20 billion and then whine about fintechs freeriding on your IT spend.
